      • run

        public void run(boolean silent)
        Description copied from interface: IDE
        Run the compiler (all components) and update all gui components with new data
        Specified by:
        run in interface IDE
        Parameters:
        silent - if set to true no output of the compiler is shown in the gui (no errorLog and no exceptions shown).

      • runLexer

        public java.util.List<Token> runLexer(java.lang.String sourceCode,
                             boolean silent)
        Description copied from interface: IDE
        Run the currently selected lexer component
        Specified by:
        runLexer in interface IDE
        Parameters:
        sourceCode - The source code to lex
        silent - if set to true no output of the compiler is shown in the gui (no errorLog and no exceptions shown).
        Returns:
        The list of tokens returned by the lexer, returns null if an error occured

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        ast - The ast to analyse

        Specified by:

        Run the currently selected backend
        Specified by:
        runBackend in interface IDE
